content: i m honored to bring you savannah as part of the moogly 2019 cal visit the mooglyblog com and check out the awesome annual cal by clicking here 1 designer s notes please take note that this pattern was designed with a 6mm hook and therefore has a per side stitch count that is less than my typical patterns see the bottom of the webpage for a print friendly option <hr> visit me polly plum get help or support and stay up to date on new patterns by checking out my website 2 everytrickonthehook for things like tutorials and free patterns liking every trick on the hook on facebook 3 following polly_plum_crochet on instagram 4 visiting polly s place on ravelry 5 or get lots of help and support from the facebook group polly plum pattern posse 6 you can see all of my patterns on my designer page on ravelry 7 1 http //www mooglyblog com/category/2014-afghan-cal/ 2 everytrickonthehook com 3 https //www facebook com/everytrickonthehook/ 4 https //www instagram com/polly_plum_crochet/ 5 http //www ravelry com/groups/pollys-place 6 https //www facebook com/groups/pollyplumcrochetpatterns/ 7 http //www ravelry com/designers/polly-plum
